NEW CAMPAIGN💉#VaccinesWithoutBorders
ASK @pfizer to share its vaccine & SAVE MORE LIVES🆘

HERE'S WHY:
1. #Vaccine supply NOT enough for all till 2023/24‼️
2. Some co. are taking steps to do good to ↗️ the production eg ❌enforce #COVID19 patent & sell 💉at cost price
